categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Clint Howard (born April 20, 1959) is an American actor. In 2012, he appeared as Hurst Romodi in a commercial for the video game Kinect Star Wars. Six years later, he had a brief role as Ralakili in Solo: A Star Wars Story. He is the younger brother of director Ron Howard and the uncle of Bryce Dallas Howard.
